ISSUE.TITLE: Roll up the formula column failed and make all rows cannot be accessed
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: NocoDB used as docker : true NocoDB version : 0.90.5 Database : mysql 8.0.22 Project was created by clicking : New Project Database on which spreadsheet is created : mysql OS on which NocoDB is running : MacOS 12.3.1 Database version : **Steps To Reproduce** 1. create two tables, one is 'tasks', and the other one is 'time log' 2. create a foreign key from tasks to time log 4. create a formula column in 'time log' to calculate the hours between two timestamp 5. in 'tasks' create a rollup column to aggregate the value of the above formula column 6. refresh the page **Expected behavior** Aggregate the values of the formula column **Actual behavior** Nothing seen in the new rollup column, and after reload the page, no data shown in **Screenshots** Node version : **v12.22.12** Arch type: **x64** Platform: **MacOS** Docker: **true** Database: **MySQL**

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: refactor: respond with 404 if project not found Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: disable virtual cols in rollup column list. ref: #1842. Signed-off-by: Wing-Kam Wong <wingkwong.code@gmail.com>
